articles.title: French government bans TikTok in overseas territory amid violent protests - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The app will be blocked as part of a state of emergency which includes the deployment of the army and a curfew on the island.
articles.content:
Four people have died and hundreds have been injured, France's interior minister Gérald Darmanin said.
